akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than August 1, 1994, the Secretary shall, in consultation with the appropriate regional scientific review group established under subsection (d), prepare a draft stock assessment for each marine mammal stock which occurs in waters under the jurisdiction of the United States. Each draft stock assessment, based on the best scientific information available, shall—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Effect on section 1371(b) of this title

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Effect on This section shall not affect or otherwise modify the provisions of section 1371(b) of this title.
